content: Thanks, In "about" I updated until it said up to date. I'm on version 102. I'm not getting an option for v115.
creator: cheri3

content:
There is no option to add a toolbar in V102. I think that went away about version 68.

Perhaps you will find the new toolbars in V115 more to your liking. Or not. They are a complete rewrite of the concept and I am struggling with having a toolbar above the menu.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Make sure the Message List Header is enabled under View/Layout, then the number of messages in the selected folder is displayed (see picture).
creator: sfhowes
